title: Create Filled Polygon with Matplotlib
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a filled polygon using Matplotlib in Python. We will use the Koch snowflake as an example polygon.

meta.title: Python Matplotlib | Filled Polygon | Koch Snowflake
meta.description: Learn how to create a filled polygon using Matplotlib in Python, with the Koch snowflake as an example.
meta.keywords: Python, Matplotlib, Filled Polygon, Koch Snowflake, Programming Tutorial
